cause.description:
Our goal is to shrink the gaps in the education of these children and provide them with the highest education possible. We do this by offering: * One-on-one tutoring * Backpacks and school supplies * A toll-free number to keep in touch with us (800-923-1100) * Assistance in entering school * Help in locating lost records * Parent guidance in educational matters for their children.
1. Provide educational assistance to homeless children through one-on-one tutoring.
cause.mission: To enhance the educational opportunities for homeless children from kindergarten through twelfth grade.
cause.name: SCHOOL ON WHEELS INC.
